item.title: Leetcode之探索学习
item.author: Mr.heesong@gmail.com (Song)
item.description: Binary Tree(二叉树) Introduction A tree is a frequently-used data structure to simulate a hierarchical tree structure. 树是经常使用的数据结构，以模拟分层树结构。 Each node of the tree will have a root value and a list of references to other nodes which are called child nodes. From graph
